formula.name: HadoopGetUniqueFile
formula.description: Gets a unique file name by combingin given string and task ID. Use this function in conjunction with NewHDFSFileMessage when you want to create your own file.

formula.name: HBaseGet
formula.description: Gets the record corresponding to the given row key and the columns as specified by defaultFamilyName and reference object.

formula.name: HBaseGet
formula.description: Gets the record corresponding to the given row key and the columns as specified by defaultFamilyName and reference object.

formula.name: HBasePut
formula.description: Inserts into HBase

formula.name: HBasePut
formula.description: Inserts into HBase

formula.name: HBaseScan
formula.description: Gets the scanner that can be used to iterate over the result set for a given HBase query.

formula.name: HBaseMoveNext
formula.description: Gets the scanner that can be used to iterate over the result set for a given HBase query.

formula.name: HBaseGetKey
formula.description: Gets the scanner that can be used to iterate over the result set for a given HBase query.

formula.name: HBaseGetKeyString
formula.description: Gets the scanner that can be used to iterate over the result set for a given HBase query.

formula.name: HBaseGetValue
formula.description: Gets the scanner that can be used to iterate over the result set for a given HBase query.

formula.name: NewHDFSFileMessage
formula.description: Depending on the mode either opens the specified hadoop file for reading (when mode is 'r') or creates the hadoop file message for writing (when mode is 'w'). If file is already present when mode is 'w', the existing file is deleted and new file is created.

formula.name: NewHDFSFileMessage
formula.description: Opens the specified hadoop file for reading.

formula.name: GetHadoopProperty
formula.description: Gets the property from job configuration.

formula.name: GetHDFSProperty
formula.description: Gets the property from job configuration.

formula.name: HadoopHasNext
formula.description: Returns a boolean based on whether the hadoop iterator has a next element to be given to the flow. This is applicable only when run under Hadoop environment.

formula.name: HadoopMoveNext
formula.description: Moves the cursor to next element (key/value) and returns true if next element is available. This is applicable only when run under Hadoop environment.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueString
formula.description: Returns the current value as string from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueObject
formula.description: Returns the current value as variant from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueBinary
formula.description: Returns the current value as binary from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueLong
formula.description: Returns the current value as long from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueInt
formula.description: Returns the current value as int from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueDouble
formula.description: Returns the current value as double from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueFloat
formula.description: Returns the current value as float from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueDataObject
formula.description: Returns the current value as data object from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueDataObject
formula.description: Returns the current value as data object from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueDataObjectSection
formula.description: Returns the current value as data object section from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetValueRawMessage
formula.description: Returns the current value as RawMessagefrom the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyString
formula.description: Returns the current key as string from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyObject
formula.description: Returns the current key as variant from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyBinary
formula.description: Returns the current key as binary from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyLong
formula.description: Returns the current key as long from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyInt
formula.description: Returns the current key as int from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyDouble
formula.description: Returns the current key as double from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyFloat
formula.description: Returns the current key as float from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyDataObject
formula.description: Returns the current key as data object from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyDataObjectSection
formula.description: Returns the current key as data object section from the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: HadoopGetKeyRawMessage
formula.description: Returns the current key as RawMessagefrom the hadoop iterator.

formula.name: EmitToHadoop
formula.description: Emits the given key-value pair into the Hadoop context.

formula.name: EmitToHadoopFile
formula.description: Emits the given key-value pair into the Hadoop context.
